akn:content.akn:p:
§ 430f–7. Definitions In sections 430f–6 to 430f–12 of this title:(1) MapThe term “Map” means the map entitled “Park Boundary-Corinth Unit”, numbered 304A/80009, and dated April 2007.
(2) ParkThe term “Park” means the Shiloh National Military Park.
(3) SecretaryThe term “Secretary” means the Secretary of the Interior.
(4) UnitThe term “Unit” means the Corinth Unit of Shiloh National Military Park established under section 430f–8 of this title.
(Pub. L. 106–271, § 3, Sept. 22, 2000, 114 Stat. 793; Pub. L. 110–161, div. F, title I, § 127(1), Dec. 26, 2007, 121 Stat. 2122.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2007—Par. (1). Pub. L. 110–161 substituted “304A/80009, and dated April 2007” for “304/80,007, and dated October 1998”.
(1) Map The term “Map” means the map entitled “Park Boundary-Corinth Unit”, numbered 304A/80009, and dated April 2007.
(2) Park The term “Park” means the Shiloh National Military Park.
(3) Secretary The term “Secretary” means the Secretary of the Interior.
(4) Unit The term “Unit” means the Corinth Unit of Shiloh National Military Park established under section 430f–8 of this title.
